text:
Nice scenery.  Very good for family/company outing. BBQ and chit chat.

Rainy day will be bad the floor is so wet and dirty. Suggest put mat.
Not much entertainment you need bring your own mahjong there.

Very good, enjoyed a lot having BBQ @ sea front. Place so big 4bedrooms with 3T&B. Living & dining room open concept,  more better if can enclose. As with greeneries around, insects also get attracted.

Very, very expensive,  one night stay more than S$300. Very  very poor facilities, electrical trip, some rooms no light  toilet bowl cover defective, call the operator several times , no maintenance people come to rectify. At night can see monitor lizard roaming around the bungalow compound.
Good place to hold BBQ and family gathering with nice sea view. But compound cleanliness could be improved, there were littering lying around
Great place to spend value time with family. We had a beautiful barbecue evening with our loved onesâ€¦Definitely will make it yearly visit to the same chalet B
